
                            
                            <p>买了个大功率的充电机，看卖家展示页面，外观有些落灰，看着环形变压器成色还行，就70元包邮拍下了。 <br> 裹 <br> 收到货一看，包装简陋 就套个纸箱子发来了，没有裹任何防摔泡沫，导致好几处都摔瘪了，这也忍了，因为电流表被摔脱落，就拆开内部查看，发现环形变压器线圈一些部位居然发乌发黑了，对比展示图片，只能猜测 内部图是刚买拍的，然后用得很旧 再挂成色好的内部图&nbsp;&nbsp;吸引买家。 <br>  <br> 话说&nbsp;&nbsp;这人的小聪明怎么都耍到这儿了。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123532sjt0kmt13kbmzh1j.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123532sjt0kmt13kbmzh1j.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123544i5c6ztx58mijmri5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123544i5c6ztx58mijmri5.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123554e185rjj5ebs3qb3y.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123554e185rjj5ebs3qb3y.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123602iqp6fqccc7qgw696.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/123602iqp6fqccc7qgw696.jpg"> <br> </p><p class="pl">退货啊&nbsp;&nbsp;别惯他</p><p class="pl">无解，你想捡漏，他想赚钱</p><p></p>
